text: 1) Provide the exact series solution to the Laplace Equation in 2D, for a 10x10 charge-free square region where the potential at the boundaries are as shown in the figure below. 0 V0 V 10 V 10 V 2) Plot a contour plot of the potential determined from summing the first 200 terms of the exact solution. 3) Numerically Solve Poisson’s equation (∇𝑉(𝑥,𝑦) = −4𝜋𝜌(𝑥,𝑦))using the same boundary conditions as above, but with a non-vanishing charge density in the interior region of 𝜌𝑥,𝑦 =𝑥,and plot a contour plot of the potential.
